AddStorageSystem.name: AddStorageSystem
AddStorageSystem.description: Grants permission to create a storage system

CancelTaskExecution.name: CancelTaskExecution
CancelTaskExecution.description: Grants permission to cancel execution of a sync task

CreateAgent.name: CreateAgent
CreateAgent.description: Grants permission to activate an agent that you have deployed on your host

CreateLocationAzureBlob.name: CreateLocationAzureBlob
CreateLocationAzureBlob.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a Microsoft Azure Blob Storage container

CreateLocationEfs.name: CreateLocationEfs
CreateLocationEfs.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon EFS file system

CreateLocationFsxLustre.name: CreateLocationFsxLustre
CreateLocationFsxLustre.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon Fsx Lustre

CreateLocationFsxOntap.name: CreateLocationFsxOntap
CreateLocationFsxOntap.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for Amazon FSx for ONTAP

CreateLocationFsxOpenZfs.name: CreateLocationFsxOpenZfs
CreateLocationFsxOpenZfs.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for Amazon FSx for OpenZFS

CreateLocationFsxWindows.name: CreateLocationFsxWindows
CreateLocationFsxWindows.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon FSx Windows File Server file system

CreateLocationHdfs.name: CreateLocationHdfs
CreateLocationHdfs.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon Hdfs

CreateLocationNfs.name: CreateLocationNfs
CreateLocationNfs.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a NFS file system

CreateLocationObjectStorage.name: CreateLocationObjectStorage
CreateLocationObjectStorage.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a self-managed object storage bucket

CreateLocationS3.name: CreateLocationS3
CreateLocationS3.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an Amazon S3 bucket

CreateLocationSmb.name: CreateLocationSmb
CreateLocationSmb.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for an SMB file system

CreateTask.name: CreateTask
CreateTask.description: Grants permission to create a sync task

DeleteAgent.name: DeleteAgent
DeleteAgent.description: Grants permission to delete an agent

DeleteLocation.name: DeleteLocation
DeleteLocation.description: Grants permission to delete a location used by AWS DataSync

DeleteTask.name: DeleteTask
DeleteTask.description: Grants permission to delete a sync task

DescribeAgent.name: DescribeAgent
DescribeAgent.description: Grants permission to view metadata such as name, network interfaces, and the status (that is, whether the agent is running or not) about a sync agent

DescribeDiscoveryJob.name: DescribeDiscoveryJob
DescribeDiscoveryJob.description: Grants permission to describe metadata about a discovery job

DescribeLocationAzureBlob.name: DescribeLocationAzureBlob
DescribeLocationAzureBlob.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Azure Blob Storage sync location

DescribeLocationEfs.name: DescribeLocationEfs
DescribeLocationEfs.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon EFS sync location

DescribeLocationFsxLustre.name: DescribeLocationFsxLustre
DescribeLocationFsxLustre.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Lustre sync location

DescribeLocationFsxOntap.name: DescribeLocationFsxOntap
DescribeLocationFsxOntap.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx for ONTAP sync location

DescribeLocationFsxOpenZfs.name: DescribeLocationFsxOpenZfs
DescribeLocationFsxOpenZfs.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx OpenZFS sync location

DescribeLocationFsxWindows.name: DescribeLocationFsxWindows
DescribeLocationFsxWindows.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Windows sync location

DescribeLocationHdfs.name: DescribeLocationHdfs
DescribeLocationHdfs.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon HDFS sync location

DescribeLocationNfs.name: DescribeLocationNfs
DescribeLocationNfs.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about a NFS sync location

DescribeLocationObjectStorage.name: DescribeLocationObjectStorage
DescribeLocationObjectStorage.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a self-managed object storage server location

DescribeLocationS3.name: DescribeLocationS3
DescribeLocationS3.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as bucket name, about an Amazon S3 bucket sync location

DescribeLocationSmb.name: DescribeLocationSmb
DescribeLocationSmb.description: Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about an SMB sync location

DescribeStorageSystem.name: DescribeStorageSystem
DescribeStorageSystem.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a storage system

DescribeStorageSystemResourceMetrics.name: DescribeStorageSystemResourceMetrics
DescribeStorageSystemResourceMetrics.description: Grants permission to describe resource metrics collected by a discovery job

DescribeStorageSystemResources.name: DescribeStorageSystemResources
DescribeStorageSystemResources.description: Grants permission to describe resources identified by a discovery job

DescribeTask.name: DescribeTask
DescribeTask.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task

DescribeTaskExecution.name: DescribeTaskExecution
DescribeTaskExecution.description: Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task that is being executed

GenerateRecommendations.name: GenerateRecommendations
GenerateRecommendations.description: Grants permission to generate recommendations for a resource identified by a discovery job

ListAgents.name: ListAgents
ListAgents.description: Grants permission to list agents owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request

ListDiscoveryJobs.name: ListDiscoveryJobs
ListDiscoveryJobs.description: Grants permission to list discovery jobs

ListLocations.name: ListLocations
ListLocations.description: Grants permission to list source and destination sync locations

ListStorageSystems.name: ListStorageSystems
ListStorageSystems.description: Grants permission to list storage systems

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags that have been added to the specified resource

ListTaskExecutions.name: ListTaskExecutions
ListTaskExecutions.description: Grants permission to list executed sync tasks

ListTasks.name: ListTasks
ListTasks.description: Grants permission to list of all the sync tasks

RemoveStorageSystem.name: RemoveStorageSystem
RemoveStorageSystem.description: Grants permission to delete a storage system

StartDiscoveryJob.name: StartDiscoveryJob
StartDiscoveryJob.description: Grants permission to start a discovery job for a storage system

StartTaskExecution.name: StartTaskExecution
StartTaskExecution.description: Grants permission to start a specific invocation of a sync task

StopDiscoveryJob.name: StopDiscoveryJob
StopDiscoveryJob.description: Grants permission to stop a discovery job

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to apply a key-value pair to an AWS resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

UpdateAgent.name: UpdateAgent
UpdateAgent.description: Grants permission to update the name of an agent

UpdateDiscoveryJob.name: UpdateDiscoveryJob
UpdateDiscoveryJob.description: Grants permission to update a discovery job

UpdateLocationAzureBlob.name: UpdateLocationAzureBlob
UpdateLocationAzureBlob.description: Grants permission to update an Azure Blob Storage sync location

UpdateLocationHdfs.name: UpdateLocationHdfs
UpdateLocationHdfs.description: Grants permission to update an HDFS sync Location

UpdateLocationNfs.name: UpdateLocationNfs
UpdateLocationNfs.description: Grants permission to update an NFS sync Location

UpdateLocationObjectStorage.name: UpdateLocationObjectStorage
UpdateLocationObjectStorage.description: Grants permission to update a self-managed object storage server location

UpdateLocationSmb.name: UpdateLocationSmb
UpdateLocationSmb.description: Grants permission to update a SMB sync location

UpdateStorageSystem.name: UpdateStorageSystem
UpdateStorageSystem.description: Grants permission to update a storage system

UpdateTask.name: UpdateTask
UpdateTask.description: Grants permission to update metadata associated with a sync task

UpdateTaskExecution.name: UpdateTaskExecution
UpdateTaskExecution.description: Grants permission to update execution of a sync task
